methods.Synopsis: Get a listing of flood tweet reports and their point geometry location

parameters.Name: type
parameters.Description: Specify requested report type {confirmed|unconfirmed}. Not required but if not specified defaults to returning confirmed reports.

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Defines the format of the requested reports data as either geojson (default) or topojson. Not required but if unspecified will default to geojson.

methods.Synopsis: Get counts of flood tweet reports over time by discrete area (e.g. number of reports for one day per country)

parameters.Name: level
parameters.Description: Specifies the level of aggregation (scale of discrete area) for report counts (e.g. country, state, city etc.). Not required but if unspecified defaults to Jakarta "village" level.

parameters.Name: hours
parameters.Description: Specifies the timescale by number of hours of the aggregation (e.g. 1 hour, 24 hours etc.). Not required but if unspecified defaults to past 30 minutes.

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Defines the format of the requested aggregates data as either geojson (default) or topojson. Not required but if unspecified will default to geojson.
